comment: One of the worst professors I've ever had. Gave everyone in my group but me an A when I did just as much as anyone else in the group. I was bullied by my group, they wanted me to fail from the beginning and when I let her know this she didn't care. I asked why she gave me a C and she couldn't tell me the specific reason. She is pro cyber bullying.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Tough grader

comment: Im sure if I met her she would be a fine person. However as a professor she is a bit condescending & calls on people regardless if you know the answer. If you miss a class, she will take points directly off your final grade. Also even 1 minute late she ridicules you in front of the class saying this is America / you are creating a disturbance.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy
